My Work

Capstone Project for Software Engineering

Advisor is a web application I designed and developed for my software engineering course at Milligan College. It's used to help advisors track their advisees.

Using the Django framework, I wrote all of the logic, models, and views in Python, as well as all of the HTML and CSS for the front end.
